mapper.select: select code, name, t_grant as tGrant from title where code=#{code};
select code, name, t_grant as tGrant from title
mapper.insert: insert into Title(code, name, t_grant) values(#{code}, #{name}, #{tGrant})
mapper.update: update title set code=#{code}, name=#{name}, t_grant=#{tGrant} where code=#{code};
